mapper.sql: ID, `NAME`, NAME_I18N, TITLE, TITLE_I18N, `DESC`, DESC_I18N, ICON, RESOURCE, UI_ACTION, UI_TYPE, UI_GROUP, UI_INDEX, NUMBER, COMPLETE_COUNT, REPEAT_TYPE, REPEAT_PARAM, START_TIME, END_TIME, COLOR, SYS_CHARACTER_ID, `LEVEL`, VIP_LEVEL, PARENT_ID, DIFFICULTY, TRIGGER_NUMBER, TRIGGER_INTERFACE, WEIGHT_RATE, PROBABILITY, IS_DELETED, IS_AUTO_AWARD
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_RANK where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or `TITLE` like '%${searchValue}%' or `NAME` like '%${searchValue}%' or `DESC` like '%${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_QUEST (ID, `NAME`, NAME_I18N, TITLE, TITLE_I18N, `DESC`, DESC_I18N, ICON, RESOURCE, UI_ACTION, UI_TYPE, UI_GROUP, UI_INDEX, NUMBER, COMPLETE_COUNT, REPEAT_TYPE, REPEAT_PARAM, START_TIME, END_TIME, COLOR, SYS_CHARACTER_ID, `LEVEL`, VIP_LEVEL, PARENT_ID, DIFFICULTY, TRIGGER_NUMBER, TRIGGER_INTERFACE, WEIGHT_RATE, PROBABILITY, IS_DELETED, IS_AUTO_AWARD, TRIGGER_EVENT, ITEMS, VIP_ITEMS ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameI18n,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleI18n,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descI18n,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uiAction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uiType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uiGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uiIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{completeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repeatType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repeatParam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{color,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysCharacterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vipLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{difficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{triggerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggerInterface,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weightRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{probability,jdbcType=REAL}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isAutoAward,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{triggerEvent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{items,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{vipItems,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nameI18n,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.titleI18n,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.descI18n,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.uiAction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.uiType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.uiGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.uiIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.number,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.completeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.repeatType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.repeatParam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.color,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sysCharacterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vipLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.difficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.triggerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.triggerInterface,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.weightRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.probability,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.isAutoAward,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.triggerEvent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.items,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.vipItems,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

update SYS_QUEST
`NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME_I18N = #{nameI18n,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE_I18N = #{titleI18n,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`DESC` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_QUEST set `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME_I18N = #{nameI18n,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE_I18N = #{titleI18n,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `DESC` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESC_I18N = #{descI18n,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOURCE = #{resource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UI_ACTION = #{uiAction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UI_TYPE = #{uiType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UI_GROUP = #{uiGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UI_INDEX = #{uiIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMPLETE_COUNT = #{completeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REPEAT_TYPE = #{repeatType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REPEAT_PARAM = #{repeatParam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COLOR = #{color,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYS_CHARACTER_ID = #{sysCharacterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `LEVEL` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VIP_LEVEL = #{vipLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DIFFICULTY = #{difficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRIGGER_NUMBER = #{triggerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRIGGER_INTERFACE = #{triggerInterface,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT_RATE = #{weightRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROBABILITY = #{probability,jdbcType=REAL}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_AUTO_AWARD = #{isAutoAward,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRIGGER_EVENT = #{triggerEvent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ITEMS = #{items,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, VIP_ITEMS = #{vipItems,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
